summary:
Guys IF YOU WANT THE Skyrim Vegetation TO BE MORE WINDY and with natural animation THEN DOWNLOAD THIS...
      I am sure you will like it with Zero FPS loss....
descriptionHtml:
[SIZE=6]Windy Skyrim[/size]

Latest Version Video By--Robiehn Vidhs
  [youtube]_XRfU5twYvY[/youtube]

Latest Version Video By Hodilton
    [youtube]tOh65s-8eN4[/youtube]

Latest version Video by BD Mods..
      [youtube]Ir6LhmWV3To[/youtube]

Latest version VIDEO----BY ME
       Guys this is my first video ..And sorry that i can\'t upload hd videos from my net,,this is just to show the differences between my mod and vanilla winds.
                                        [YOUTUBE]PMqON_9JQ2w[/YOUTUBE]

GUYS Here is the video of old version of this mod -- BY \"fluttershykisses\"--
[youtube]q_DFykMCqr4[/youtube]

********************************************************************************************************
GUYS ALSO HAVE A LOOK ON MY Aspen Leaves Retexture..
      [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32660/]Detailed Aspen Leaves[/url]
********************************************************************************************************
[SIZE=4]
--guys i created this mod for my own almost a month a go ....
..And now just thought to share it.
..I DON\'T LIKED THE LESS WINDY VEGETATION AND THUS I CREATED THIS MOD..
..Obviously we are not able to See tees AND plants to be conflict with wind ,,I mean their windy animation is very less according to real life
..Thus as a environment lover i made them to be more windy..
..This mod contains 1 esp file which will make your vegetation to be more windy..
..Now this mod contains all trees and plants ..but not grasses
..Obviously not all will like this mod..
..Please endorse my work if you like ..

AVERAGE FPS--30+  (REQUIRED)

[COLOR=GREEN]Guys Any one who is not getting the animation\'s to be worked..Then DO THIS --
              *Set the SHADOWS = MEDIUM\" in the skyrim launcher--\"

Good luck...[/color]

INSTALLATION...
   Using NMM {Nexus mod manager}

Credits
   Skyrim makers
   Nexus Site..

Thanks for videos to ..
   fluttershykisses
   Robiehn Vidhs
  Hodilton
  BD Mods...

ENJOY THE GAME[/SIZE]
author: Hritik Vaishnav-SkyrimENB
